member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Language.Intellisense.IInteractiveQuickInfoContent
member.summary: Represents an interactive Quick Info content. This interface can be used to add an interactive content such as hyperlinks to the Quick Info popup. If any object implementing this interface is provided to via , the Quick Info presenter will allow to interact with this content, particulartly it will keep Quick Info popup open when mouse is over it and will allow this content to recieve mouse events.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Language.Intellisense.IInteractiveQuickInfoContent.KeepQuickInfoOpen
member.summary: Gets whether the interactive Quick Info content wants to keep current Quick Info session open. Until this property is true, the containing this content won't be dismissed even if mouse is moved somewhere else. This is useful in very rare scenarios when an interactive Quick Info content handles all input interaction, while needs to keep this open (the only known example so far is LightBulb in its expanded state hosted in Quick Info).
